flawed_nl_solution:
Tommy has a total of 20 x 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 kilograms of tomatoes.
Only 60 - 3 = <<60-3=75>>75 kilograms can be sold.
His earnings for the tomatoes will be $75*6=450.
Thus, his profit will be $450 - $330 = $<<450-330=120>>120.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 57, not 75. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
